labels.Streams\/invitedMe: Ko wai i kii mai ki ahau

interests.Filter: He aha koe e koa ana?
interests.CanAdd: Mena kaore e taea e koe te rapu i nga mea e rapu ana koe, ka taea e koe te whakauru i tetahi kaupapa hou kei raro nei:
interests.TrySynonyms: Kaua e kite? Nganahia etahi kupu whakarite.
interests.AddUnderCategory: Tāpiri i raro i te kāwai ...

chat.flaggedForAdminReview: Kua tohua te karere mo te arotake a te kaiwhakahaere. Patohia ano ki te rehu.
chat.closeChatConfirm: Kei te hiahia koe kia kati i tenei korerorero?

dialog.photoInstruction: Mena kei mua i te aroaro o te tangata nana i tirotiro i to QR code, tangohia he whakaahua
dialog.title: Fakaafe'i
dialog.placeholder: Tau nama me te wāhitau īmēra
dialog.orInvite: Raneihia nga iwi ma te whakamahi:

email.subject: Tena, tirohia tenei
email.PleaseVisitLink: Tena koa ki te hononga e whai ake nei:
email.InvitingYou: Kei te karanga ahau ki a koe [{999}}

sms.content: Kua tohaina koe ki {{title}}. Tena koa {{url}}

notice.text: Kua karangatia koe. {{ClickOrTap}} konei hei whakaae me te whakauru mai.

html.posted: {{call 'avatar.displayName'}} te tuku i te {{message.fields.type}} karere ki {{stream.fields.title}}

mobile.alert: Ka tukuna mai nga tono mai i to maatau nama, kaore i mohiohia e ou hoa. Whakamahia he korero tere kia mohio ai ratou kua tae mai te awhina mai ia koe, me te tono ia ratou ki te patene i te hononga.
mobile.confirm: Ka tukuna mai nga tono mai i to maatau nama, kaore i mohiohia e ou hoa. E hiahia ana koe ki te whai ake i tetahi tuhinga tere kia mohio ai koe kua tae mai te tono mai ia koe, me te tono ia ratou ki te patene i te hononga.
mobile.check: Na, kua tonoa e ahau he tono ki a koe ki te taupānga {{app}}. Titiro koa ki a koutou sms ka kiria te hononga!

email.alert: Ka tukuna mai nga tono mai i to rohe, kaore ano i mohio o hoa. Whakamahia he korero tere kia mohio ai ratou kua tae mai te awhina mai ia koe, me te tono ia ratou ki te patene i te hononga.
email.confirm: Ka tukuna mai nga tono mai i to rohe, kaore ano i mohio o hoa. E hiahia ana koe ki te whai ake i tetahi tuhinga tere kia mohio ai koe kua tae mai te tono mai ia koe, me te tono ia ratou ki te patene i te hononga.
email.subject: I whiwhi koe i tetahi urunga?
email.body: Na, kua tonoa e ahau he tono ki a koe ki te taupānga {{app}}. Tena koa tirohia to īmēra me te pāwhiri i te hono i reira!

allow.cameraAndMicrophoneTitle: Whakahohea te Kāmera me te Waeaoro
